mapper.insert: insert into schedule ( PARTY_ID, SCH_TITLE, SCH_WRITER, SCH_CONTENT, SCH_LOCATION, SCH_NOTE, SCH_MEMBER_COUNT, SCH_DATE) values (#{party_id}, #{sch_title},#{sch_writer},#{sch_content},#{sch_location}, #{sch_note},#{sch_member_count},#{sch_date})
mapper.select: select u.name from user u join schedule_member s on u.user_id = s.user_id where s.party_id =${party_id}
